verses.t: Therefore{G1352} leaving{G863} the principles of{G3588} the doctrine{G3056} of Christ{G3588}, let us go on{G5342} unto{G1909} perfection{G3588}; not{G3361} laying{G2598} again{G3825} the foundation{G2310} of repentance{G3341} from{G575}dead{G3498} works{G2041}, and{G2532} of faith{G4102} toward{G1909} God{G2316},
Of the doctrine{G1322} of baptisms{G909}, and{G5037} of laying on{G1936} of hands{G5495}, and{G5037} of resurrection{G386} of the dead{G3498}, and{G2532} of{G2917} eternal{G166} judgment{G2917}.
And{G2532} this{G5124} will we do{G4160}, if{G1437} God{G3588} permit{G2010}.

For{G1063} it is impossible{G102} for those who were{G5461} once{G530} enlightened{G5461}, and{G5037} have tasted{G1089} of the{G3588} heavenly{G2032} gift{G1431}, and{G2532} were made{G1096} partakers{G3353} of the{G4151} Holy{G40} Ghost{G4151},
And{G2532} have tasted{G1089} the{G4487} good{G2570} word{G4487} of God{G2316}, and{G5037} the powers{G1411} of the world{G165} to come{G3195},

If{G2532} they shall fall away{G3895}, to renew them{G340} again{G3825} unto{G1519} repentance{G3341}; seeing they crucify{G388} to themselves{G1438} the Son{G3588} of God{G3588} afresh{G388}, and{G2532} put{G3856} him to an open shame{G3856}.

For{G1063} the earth which{G1093} drinketh in{G4095} the rain{G5205} that cometh{G2064} oft{G4178} upon{G1909} it{G846}, and{G2532} bringeth forth{G5088} herbs{G1008} meet{G2111} for them{G1565} by{G1223} whom{G3739} it is dressed{G1090}, receiveth{G3335} blessing{G2129} from{G575} God{G3588}:
But{G1161} that which beareth{G1627} thorns{G173} and{G2532} briers{G5146} is rejected{G96}, and{G2532} is nigh unto{G1451} cursing{G2671}; whose{G3739} end{G3588} is to{G1519} be burned{G2740}.

But{G1161}, beloved{G27}, we are persuaded{G3982} better things{G2909} of{G4012} you{G5216}, and{G2532} things that accompany{G2192} salvation{G4991}, though{G2532} we{G2980} thus{G3779} speak{G2980}.

For{G1063} God{G3588} is not{G3756} unrighteous{G94} to forget{G1950} your{G5216} work{G3588} and{G2532} labour{G3588} of love{G3588}, which{G3739} ye have shewed{G1731} toward{G1519} his{G846} name{G3588}, in that ye have ministered to{G1247} the saints{G40}, and{G2532} do minister{G1247}.
And{G1161} we desire that{G1937} every one{G1538} of you{G5216} do shew{G1731} the{G4710} same{G846} diligence{G4710} to{G4314} the full assurance{G3588} of hope{G3588} unto{G891} the end{G5056}:
That{G2443} ye be{G1096} not{G3361} slothful{G3576}, but{G1161} followers{G3402} of them who{G2816} through{G1223} faith{G4102} and{G2532} patience{G3115} inherit{G2816} the promises{G3588}.
For{G1063} when{G1861} God{G3588} made promise{G1861} to Abraham{G11}, because{G1893} he could{G2192} swear{G3660} by{G2596} no{G3762} greater{G3173}, he sware{G3660} by{G2596} himself{G1438},
Saying{G3004}, Surely{G3375} blessing{G2127} I will bless{G2127} thee{G4571}, and{G2532} multiplying{G4129} I will multiply{G4129} thee{G4571}.
And{G2532} so{G3779}, after he had patiently endured{G3114}, he obtained{G2013} the promise{G3588}.
For{G1063} men{G444} verily{G3303} swear{G3660}by{G2596} the greater{G3173}: and{G2532} an oath{G3588} for{G1519} confirmation{G951} is to them{G846} an end{G4009} of{G485} all{G3956} strife{G485}.

Where{G3739}in{G1722} God{G3588}, willing{G1014} more abundantly{G4054} to shew{G1925} unto the heirs{G3588} of promise{G3588} the immutability{G276} of{G3588} his{G846} counsel{G1012}, confirmed{G3315} it by an oath{G3727}:

That{G2443} by{G1223} two{G1417} immutable{G276} things{G4229}, in{G1722} which{G3739} it was impossible{G102} for God{G2316} to lie{G5574}, we might have{G2192} a{G3874} strong{G2478} consolation{G3874}, who have fled for refuge{G2703} to lay hold{G2902} upon the hope{G1680} set before us{G4295}:

Which{G3739} hope we have{G2192} as{G5613} an anchor{G45} of the soul{G3588}, both{G5037} sure{G804} and{G2532} stedfast{G949}, and{G2532} which entereth{G1525} into{G1519} that within{G2082} the veil{G3588};

Whither{G3699} the forerunner{G4274} is{G1525} for{G5228} us{G2257} entered{G1525}, even Jesus{G2424}, made{G1096} an high priest{G749} for{G1519} ever{G3588} after{G2596} the order{G3588} of Melchisedec{G3198}.
